WOlfblade:

She grinned and transformed into wolf mode. Her forearm lazar blasters
were always ready. She smiled a wolfish grin to him. "Excersize you
want? Excersize you get. Just try to keep up." she said teasing him,
and took off towards the entrance. She grinned as she passed the front
doors and saw sky again. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malice smiled as he helped Wolfblade to her feet.  She was too much,
how was he lucky enough to ensnare her spark?  Oh well, the ways fate
work are not always clear.
>  
> "Yes, let us go.  I'm sure you will welcome the exercise," he jested.
>  
> He left her very breifly to go and get his sword and disruptor rifle
from the weapons locker where Organics had put them.  Satisfied to
have his weapons back, he hurried back to Wolfblade and lead her out
the base entrance, where he turned to her again.
>  
> "It's quite a ways out, it'll take a while to get there.  Let's keep
our optics peeled and on the look out," Malice said as he transfromed
into beast mode and waited on Wolfblade.
> 
>
